title: Component Reference
content:
# Component Reference

2022-07-03 18:44

## View Container

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **Component Name** | **Function Description** |
| [view](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_view-container_view) | View container. |
| [swiper](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_view-container_swiper) | Swiper view container. |
| [scroll-view](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_view-container_scroll-view) | Scroll view region. |
| [movable-view](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_view-container_movable-view) | Movable view. |
| [movalbe-area](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_view-container_movable-area) | Area for movable view. |

## Basic Content

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **Component Name** | **Function Description** |
| [text](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_basic-content_text) | Text. |
| [icon](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_basic-content_icon) | Icon. |
| [progress](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_basic-content_progress) | Progress bar. |

## Form Component

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **Component Name** | **Function Description** |
| [button](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_form-component_button) | Button. |
| [form](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_form-component_form) | Form. |
| [label](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_form-component_label) | Label. |
| [input](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_form-component_input) | Input box. |
| [textarea](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_form-component_textarea) | Multi-row input box. |
| [radio](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_form-component_radio) | Radio selector. |
| [checkbox](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_form-component_checkbox) | Multiple selector. |
| [switch](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_form-component_switch) | Switch. |
| [slider](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_form-component_slider) | Sliding selector. |
| [picker-view](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_form-component_picker-view) | Scroll selector embedded in the page. |
| [picker](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_form-component_picker) | Scroll selector popping up from the bottom. |

## Navigator

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **Component Name** | **Function Description** |
| [navigator](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_navigator_navigator) | Page link. |

## Multimedia

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **Component Name** | **Function Description** |
| [image](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_multimedia_image) | Image. |

## Canvas

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **Component Name** | **Function Description** |
| [canvas](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_canvas_canvas) | Canvas. |

## Open

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **Component Name** | **Function Description** |
| [web-view](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_open_web-view) | The component that runs the web page. |

## Experience Mini Program

Developers can use the [Android Demo App](https://gw.alipayobjects.com/os/bmw-prod/c23b76e2-2fad-4d17-95ee-39d3000c80a4.apk) to scan the QR code shown in the component documents.
